member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContextReflection
member.summary: Holder for reflection information generated from google/devtools/source/v1/source_context.proto

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext
member.summary: A SourceContext is a reference to a tree of files. A SourceContext together with a path point to a unique revision of a single file or directory.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.CloudRepo
member.summary: A SourceContext referring to a revision in a cloud repo.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.CloudWorkspace
member.summary: A SourceContext referring to a snapshot in a cloud workspace.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.Gerrit
member.summary: A SourceContext referring to a Gerrit project.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.Git
member.summary: A SourceContext referring to any third party Git repo (e.g. GitHub).

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.ContextOneofCase
member.summary: Enum of possible cases for the "context" oneof.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.s_fileReadAllTextFunc
member.summary: The func that reads file all text. Can be overridden by unit tests.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.s_fileExistsFunc
member.summary: The func that tests if file exists. Can be overridden by unit tests.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.GitRevisionIdLogLabel
member.summary: Gets the custom log label of Stackdriver Logging entry to set Git revision id. When writing a Stackdriver Logging entry, the user should add this custom label, with a value of the git revision id for the source code. This enables Google Cloud Tools for Visual Studio to locate the source file revision of the log entry.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.AppSourceContext
member.exception: The source context file is valid JSON, but is not valid as a SourceContext.
The source context file is not valid JSON.
The application does not have permission to read the file.
The application is not authorized to access the file.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.OpenParseFile
member.summary: Open the source context file and parses it (as JSON) to a proto.
member.returns: A object if the file is read and parsed successfully, or null if there is an error reading/parsing the file or the source context file is not found.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.Read
member.summary: Finds the source context file and reads the content as a string.

member.name: M:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.SourceContext.ResetAppSourceContext
member.summary: Intended to be used by unit test only.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.ExtendedSourceContext
member.summary: An ExtendedSourceContext is a SourceContext combined with additional details describing the context.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.AliasContext
member.summary: An alias to a repo revision.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.AliasContext.Types
member.summary: Container for nested types declared in the AliasContext message type.

member.name: F:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.AliasContext.Types.Kind.Other
member.summary: OTHER is used to specify non-standard aliases, those not of the kinds above. For example, if a Git repo has a ref named "refs/foo/bar", it is considered to be of kind OTHER.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.CloudRepoSourceContext
member.summary: A CloudRepoSourceContext denotes a particular revision in a cloud repo (a repo hosted by the Google Cloud Platform).

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.CloudRepoSourceContext.AliasName
member.summary: The name of an alias (branch, tag, etc.).

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.CloudRepoSourceContext.AliasContext
member.summary: An alias, which may be a branch or tag.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.CloudRepoSourceContext.RevisionOneofCase
member.summary: Enum of possible cases for the "revision" oneof.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.CloudWorkspaceSourceContext
member.summary: A CloudWorkspaceSourceContext denotes a workspace at a particular snapshot.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.CloudWorkspaceSourceContext.SnapshotId
member.summary: The ID of the snapshot. An empty snapshot_id refers to the most recent snapshot.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.GerritSourceContext
member.summary: A SourceContext referring to a Gerrit project.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.GerritSourceContext.HostUri
member.summary: The URI of a running Gerrit instance.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.GerritSourceContext.GerritProject
member.summary: The full project name within the host. Projects may be nested, so "project/subproject" is a valid project name. The "repo name" is hostURI/project.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.GerritSourceContext.AliasName
member.summary: The name of an alias (branch, tag, etc.).

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.GerritSourceContext.AliasContext
member.summary: An alias, which may be a branch or tag.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.GerritSourceContext.RevisionOneofCase
member.summary: Enum of possible cases for the "revision" oneof.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.GitSourceContext
member.summary: A GitSourceContext denotes a particular revision in a third party Git repository (e.g. GitHub).

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.RepoId
member.summary: A unique identifier for a cloud repo.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.RepoId.ProjectRepoId
member.summary: A combination of a project ID and a repo name.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.RepoId.IdOneofCase
member.summary: Enum of possible cases for the "id" oneof.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.ProjectRepoId
member.summary: Selects a repo using a Google Cloud Platform project ID (e.g. winged-cargo-31) and a repo name within that project.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.ProjectRepoId.RepoName
member.summary: The name of the repo. Leave empty for the default repo.

member.name: T:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.CloudWorkspaceId
member.summary: A CloudWorkspaceId is a unique identifier for a cloud workspace. A cloud workspace is a place associated with a repo where modified files can be stored before they are committed.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.CloudWorkspaceId.RepoId
member.summary: The ID of the repo containing the workspace.

member.name: P:Google.Cloud.DevTools.Source.V1.CloudWorkspaceId.Name
member.summary: The unique name of the workspace within the repo. This is the name chosen by the client in the Source API's CreateWorkspace method.
